child_plan_rest.title: We have following child plans. To purchase any of these plans please click on I am interested button below.

data.title: RELIABLE SULAV BAL JEEVAN BIMA PLUS PLAN
data.subtitle: Reliable Sulav Bal Jeevan Bima Plus Life Insurance is a best life insurance policy for children. Parents can plan for the higher education, marriage and so on of the children by purchasing this plan. The parents can purchase the policy from age 31 days till age of 15 years. This plan provides extra coverage of monthly income benefit (MIB), premium waiver benefit (PWB), accidental death benefit (ADB), Total disability benefit (TDB) and critical illness (CI) riders for the proposer.

Details.interest: Reliable Sulav Bal Jeevan Bima Plus Plan
Details.title: RELIABLE SULAV BAL JEEVAN BIMA PLUS PLAN

listitem.text: Minimum Sum Assured: NPR. 3,00,000
Maximum Sum Assured: NPR 50,00,000 (Cumulative for all policies as per the Beema Samiti Guidelines).
Minimum Entry Age: Life Assured – Child: 31 days, 0 years (last birthday)<b> Proposer: 18 years (last birthday)

Maximum Entry Age: Life Assured – Child: 15 years (last birthday)
Proposer: 65 years (last birthday)
Minimum Term: 5 years
Maximum Term: 54 years
Minimum Maturity Age: 18 years (last birthday)
Maximum Maturity Age: 69 years (last birthday)
Mode of Premium Payment: Yearly, Half-Yearly, Quarterly and Monthly

subtitle1.title: Modal loading will be applicable for modal premium other than yearly as follows:

listitem.text: Half Yearly : (Annual Premium x 1.01)/2
Quarterly: (Annual Premium x 1.02)/4
Monthly: (Annual Premium x 1.025)/12
Loading will not be applicable on monthly mode if premium payment is through salary scheme.
Premium Payment Term: Equal to the Policy Term

subtitle1.title: Additional benefits (proposer) for age of 18 years and above

listitem.text: Monthly Income Benefit(MIB): In case of death of the proposer during the term of the policy, the child gets amount equal to 1% of Sum Assured in monthly basis up to age 16 years.

Premium Waiver Benefit(PWB): If proposer becomes permanently disable due to accident or sickness then the entire future premium will be waived. On maturity the policy holder will receive the Insured amount plus accrued bonus without paying any installment from the date of disability.
Accidental Death Benefit(ADB): In case of death of the proposer during the term of the policy due to accident the nominee gets accidental death benefit amount.
Permanent Total Disability Benefit(PTD) : If a proposer becomes permanently disable due to accident or sickness then the proposer will receive a sum equal to the Insured amount.

subtitle1.title: Policy Loan Provisions: Provided the policy has acquired surrender value, the life assured may obtain a loan up-to 90% of the surrender value.

data.title: Reliable Higher Education Life Insurance
data.subtitle: Reliable Higher Education Life Insurance is a best life insurance policy for children. Parents can plan for the higher education of the children by purchasing this plan. The maturity value received from this policy will be used for the higher education of the children. The parents can purchase the policy from the time of birth till age of 15 years. Risk date will start only when child attains age of 6 years or completion of 2 policy years whichever is later.

Details.title: Death Benefits:
Details.paragraph: On death of the child during the policy term but before commencement of risk, the Return of Premium excluding extra premiums till the date of death will be payable to the nominee / beneficiary. The policy will terminate upon such payment. On death of the child during the policy term but after commencement of risk, the Insured Amount under the policy plus the Accrued Bonus as on the date of death will be payable to the nominee / beneficiary. The policy will terminate upon such payment.

listitem.text: Minimum Insured Amount : Nrs. 50,000
Minimum Age at Entry : 0 years (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Entry : 15 years (Last Birthday)
Minimum Age at Maturity : 10 years (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Maturity : 25 years (Last Birthday)
Policy Term : 10 to 25 years

By purchasing this child will be covered by additional benefit. On death of the proposer/parent during the policy term, a monthly benefit equal to 1% of the Insured Amount under the rider will be payable to the life assured  (child) under the base policy on every monthly anniversary of the rider from the date of death of the proposer/parent upto the end of the rider term or the death of the life assured (child) whichever is earlier and the rider shall terminate thereafter.

By purchasing this child will be covered by additional benefit. All future Premiums under the base policy to which the rider is attached shall be waived off on disability of the proposer/parent resulting from accident or sickness. On maturity child will receive Insured Amount plus additional bonus. Bonus will be given according to the latest bonus rate.

data.title: Reliable Samunnati Jeevan Beema
data.subtitle: Reliable Samunnati Jeevan Beema is an insurance plan which is anticipated (money back) life insurance plan. It can be purchased for a fixed period of time by paying the regular installment premium on yearly/half yearly/quarterly/monthly basis till policy term.

Details.title: Reliable Samunnati Jeevan Beema
Details.paragraph: The policy holder will receive the payouts (annually or four yearly) within policy term and on maturity the policy holder will receive accrued bonus plus the remaining Insured Amount (Sum Assured).

listitem.text: Minimum Insured Amount : Nrs. 500,000
Maximum Insured Amount : Depends upon income of customer
Minimum Age at Entry : 16 year (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Entry : 65 years (Last Birthday)
Policy Term : 5 to 25 years

data.title: Reliable Anticipated Plan
data.subtitle: This is a money back (anticipated) product where the customers receives certain amount of money after paying 4 years of premium. The refund will be made on every alternate year (5th year, 7th year, 9th year and so on) .

listitem.text: Minimum Insured Amount : Nrs. 200,000
Maximum Insured Amount : Depends upon income of customer
Minimum Age at Entry : 16 years (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Entry : 55 years (Last Birthday)
Policy Term : 10/12/14/16/18/20 years

Accidental Death Benefit : In case of death of the policy holder during the term of the policy due to accident the nominee will get insured amount plus accidental death benefit amount and accrued bonus.

Permanent Total Disability Benefit: If a policy holder becomes permanently disable due to accident or sickness then the policy holder will receive a sum equal to the Insured amount and policy will remain continue till maturity by paying the premium by the policy holder. On maturity policy holder will again receive the insured amount plus bonus.

Premium Waiver Benefit: If a policy holder becomes permanently disable due to accident or sickness then all the future premium will be waived. On maturity the policy holder will receive the insured amount plus accrued bonus without paying any installment from the date of disability.
First Policy Issue Date : 2074-06-31

data.title: SULAV JEEVAN BEEMA
data.subtitle: Sulav Jeevan Beema is an insurance plan which is one of the most appreciated life insurance policy among Life Insurance companies in Nepal. This policy can be purchased for a new born child as well as for an adult. It can be purchased for a fixed period of time by paying the regular installment premium on yearly/half yearly/quarterly/monthly basis.

listitem.text: Minimum Insured Amount : Nrs. 200,000
Maximum Insured Amount : Depends upon income of customer
Minimum Age at Entry : 18 year (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Entry : 65 years (Last Birthday)
Policy Term : 5 to 54 years
Risk Commencement Date: Risk  will commence immediately after commencement of policy.
Death Benefit: On death of policy holder during policy term Insured Amount plus accrued bonus will be paid to the nominee/beneficiary
Maturity Benefit: On maturity policy holder receives Insured Amount plus accrued bonus on maturity.
First Policy Issue Date : 2074-11-20

Details.title: RELIABLE ENDOWMENT AND WHOLE LIFE INSURANCE

data.title: RELIABLE DHANAPATI LIFE INSURANCE
data.subtitle: Reliable Dhanapati is a special product for customers. This is a guaranteed return plan, the maturity value is guaranteed on maturity as well as for death of policy holder. It covers savings as well as  protection for the customers. Customers can choose the maturity value and time duration on their own. Customers can become crore pati or multi crore pati on their own choice of time duration.

listitem.text: Minimum Insured Amount : Nrs. 50,00,000
Maximum Insured Amount : Depends on income level of customers
Minimum Age at Entry  : 16 yrs (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Entry  : 55 yrs (Last Birthday)
Policy Term : 10 to 40 yrs
Mode of Payment : Yearly/Half Yearly/Quarterly/Monthly

Death Benefit : On death of the policy holder the Insured Amount will be paid to nominee/beneficiary. In case of accidental death additional amount equal to accidental rider amount (rider sum assured) purchased by the policy holder will be paid to the nominee/beneficiary.
Maturity Benefit: On survival of policy holder to the end of policy term Insured Amount will be paid to the policy holder.
Accidental Rider Benefit: Accidental Rider Benefit will be available.
First Policy Issue Date : 2074-06-31

health_plan_rest.title: We have the following Health Insurance Rider Benefits. To purchase any of these health benefits please click on I am interested button below.

data.title: Critical Illness Benefit:
data.subtitle: This benefit should be purchased along with another life insurance plan. This offers protection to policy holder in case of illness. If the policy holder is diagnosed with a specific critical illness during the policy term, a sum equal to the Insured Amount of this benefit will be paid to the policy holder. The amount will be paid only one time during the policy period.

listitem.text: Minimum Insured Amount: Nrs. 50,000
Maximum Insured Amount: Nrs. 50,00,000
Minimum Age at Entry : 18 year (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Entry : 60 years (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Maturity : 65 years (Last Birthday)
Policy Term : 5 to 20 years
A waiting period of 90 days shall be applicable under this benefit from the date of inception or reinstatement. No claim shall be paid.
A survival period of 30 days is applicable from the diagnosis of Critical Illness.
Yearly, Half Yearly, Quarterly and Monthly
General Medical Examination
ECG with 12 leads
6th PA view chest x ray
Urine test

data.title: Hospitalization Cash Benefit:
data.subtitle: This benefit should be purchased along with another life insurance plan. This provides the cash benefit to the policy holder to cover hospitalization expense due to accident during the policy term.

Details.title: Benefits:
Details.paragraph: The benefit is payable to the policy holder in the event of being hospitalized for surgery or admitted to an Intensive Care Unit (ICU) due to accident. The length of stay should be minimum 72 hours and hospitalization should be within 24 hours of accident causing bodily injury. Cash benefit of 0.1% of Insured Amount per day of hospitalization will be provided to the policy holder subject to maximum of 365 days per accident.

listitem.text: Minimum Insured Amount: Nrs. 50,000
Maximum Insured Amount: Nrs. 50,00,000
Minimum Age at Entry : 18 year (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Entry : 55 years (Last Birthday)
Maximum Age at Maturity : 60 years (Last Birthday)
Policy Term : 5 to 20 years
Yearly, Half Yearly, Quarterly and Monthly
Location of Hospitalization: Nepal
Premium:  Nrs. 6  for Insured Amount of Nrs. 100,000/-
